page.title: 20COMMUNICATIONS/MEDIA STURTON
page.content: {MEDIA NATIONAL AND LOCAL{NEWSPAPERS}ARE AVAILABLE. THE CHURCH PRODUCES A MONTHLY{PARISH MAGAZINE}CARRYING VILLAGE NEWS AND A DIARY. THERE IS A {FREE PAPER}GIVING LOCAL NEWS AND ADVERTISING.{TELEVISION AND RADIO, INCLUDING{RADIO LINCOLNSHIRE,}GIVE INTERNATIONAL,NATIONAL AND AREA NEWS. { {COMMUNICATIONS {TELEPHONES}ARE IN A MAJORITY OF HOMES. {PUBLIC TELEPHONE BOXES}ARE SITED IN STURTON AND BROXHOLME.{C.B. RADIO AND {SHORTWAVE SETS}ARE USED IN SOME LOCAL FIRMS. THE{POSTAL SERVICE}CONSISTS OF A DAILY DELIVERY OF LETTERS AND PARCELS TO ALL HOMES AND BUSINESSES AND A TWICE DAILY COLLECTION FROM POST BOXES SPREAD AROUND THE AREA.
